name: Falling Stones (Autumn Lee)
description:
Can you help a man survive the relentless onslaught of stones falling from the sky? 

Test your reflexes and see how long you can keep him running. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Move your character left and right to avoid falling stones.

- Collect red and blue stars, and achieve the ultimate high score.

- Share your last moment.

- Unlock various difficulty levels and 35 achievements.

- Don't miss your daily bonus.
